entry.title: Blue Diamond - Diced Almonds Natural - 25 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blue Diamond
Type: BAKING
Price: 179.99

Blue Diamond - Diced Almonds Natural - 25 Lbs

Add texture and taste to your popular dishes with these Diced almonds!

Perfect for your restaurant or bakery's pantry, a quality product at a great value. This versatile ingredient features an endless number of uses, from garnishing salads and string beans to decorating cakes and pastries. Plus, since they're raw, they won't lend any additional salty flavor.

Versatile Culinary Ingredient

They're just the right size for a variety of applications, such as the finishing touch on salads, parfaits, ice cream, fresh fruit, or enhancing the presentation of baked goods. They add crunchy texture and nutty taste to a variety of entrees such as steamed vegetables or crusted fish, without adding any extra salt.

Bulk Supply

Perfect for high volume establishments, this packing keeps your bakery or restaurant well-stocked for the variety of uses. Plus, with an ample amount, it's easy to quickly measure your ingredients or simply grab a spoonful to sprinkle on dishes.

entry.title: Prosperity - Blanched Almond Flour - 1.5 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Prosperity
Type: BAKING
Price: 39.99

Prosperity - Blanched Almond Powder - 1.5 Kg

Made from fine-ground, blanched California almonds, this flour is optimal for creating protein-rich baked goods. With its fine texture and distinctive flavor, almond flour is ideal for making gluten-free breads, macarons, cakes, pastries, and pie crusts. Its naturally nutty flavor is also complementary to a variety of baked goods, and it can be used in place of breadcrumbs for many recipes.

Healthy Alternative

Great for your patrons following a gluten free, paleo, keto, or low carb diet, almond flour reduces the amount of total calories in your recipes. Known for their many health benefits, almonds are a good source of protein, are very low in carbohydrates, and contain a good amount of beneficial vitamins and minerals.

Fine Consistency

Milled to a very fine consistency, this almond flour is perfect for French macarons, pie crusts, quick breads, cookies, cakes, pancakes, and more. Because almonds have a high fat content, this flour will produce baked goods with a moist texture and tender crumb.

Naturally Gluten-Free

Offering gluten-free options on your menu accommodates a wider customer-base and provides delicious, diet-appropriate meals; it sets your business apart from the rest, showing a sensitivity to dietary needs and offering delicious and inclusive menu options.
